description: Doesn't even allow full page usage , seriously this has been like this since 2018, why recommend a non functioning program?

By default, all my sheets open with all the toolbars enabled and enlarged, and I cannot find a way to close them. I cannot get past this, and have searched the common areas (View, Tools, Settings), toggling things on and off, etc. The 'Cell formatting/Shape Handling/Connect Shapes' toolbar takes 60% of my vertical screen. This program had me shouting out loud.

It has all you would need for a worksheet, but it lacks a save type called "xlsx" it was very disappointing since what I required it for needed that file type only, for just normal use without needing to save with that type, I would recommend it.

I really want Calligra to improve. It integrates nicely with KDE, and has a nice direct format that could be very powerful, and sometimes it is a really nice, clean, alternative to Excel. But it's still too buggy. It freezes for me on Gnome; even on Neon, it won't save files as CSV...but I think it has potential.
Not useful app, very messy, not clean and compact
Very much annoying. Could not set image like sign behind the excel sheet. Not recommended for MS Office alternative at all.

I read revue after revue about alternatives to Libre Office which I now hate, I disliked 6 but put up with it.
The interface leaves a lot to be desired and it offers some basics of other packages but not all - I am not referring to advanced but basic operations.
summary: How can this be an alternative to other packages?

description: UI/UX is good but it needs to support more spreadsheet formats.
It seems to be impossible to change the decimal separator from a dot to a comma.
summary: works for basic stuff, not more

description: A pesar de que Words es inestable sólo o principalmente a nivel de herramientas y barras de las mismas y documentos con pérdidas de formatos leves, Sheets es el que más sufre de una pérdida de compatibilidad tanto en formato MS como en Libreoffice pese a ser más maduro que Words. Sin embargo, el uso comprueba que eso no evita que sea un programa ofimático avanzado y profundamente prometedor, aunque faltan características como formateo y funciones, su adaptación al modo nocturno en el sistema (posibilidad de dejar las celdas negras/o en blanco), tipografías estables/no-variantes y celdas con formato no presentes en otras suites.
summary: Avanzado y poderoso, pero con carencias críticas

description: Imagino que esta aplicación funciona bien en otro entorno. En Ubuntu tiene un panel gigante que cubre casi toda la pantalla y no se puede cerrar. Como hoja de cálculo la aplicación se atasca.

J'ai rarement vu une application aussi buggée, obligé de tout fermer au bout de 2 minutes car soudainement, les menus prennent toute la place et on ne voit plus rien...
Dommage car c'est la seule suite bureautique récente codée en langage natif.

Cette application est partie en sucette lors de la désinstallation, elle a buggée mon affichage et arrêtée mon moniteur natif. Si vous êtes novice sur Linux, c'est la panique !
Par précaution (dans terminal): autoremove + purge + update puis reboot.
PC revenu à la normal.
Crashes every time while opening file.
软件本身的质量相当高，在格式兼容下请在多下功夫
